divs: Sighting DetailsI wen,t outside to water the grass and looked up at the stars.While watering the grass I looked up toward the south west and noticed what appeared to be a very bright star that was moving toward my direction! I watched this bright light as it slowly moved directly over my house.I was surprised at the fact that I did not hear any sounds and that thier was no flashing lights.This was a very bright white light.I stood and watch this light slowly go over head and move slowly to the north east until it diappeared.This took about 5 or 6 minutes to take place.The object was moving in a staight line for the entire time I was watching.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Thornton
There were no other sightings in Thornton on or around April 22nd 2009
Summary: Very bright light , moving slow, straight over-head, no sound !!!!!!!!
